title: Calories in a Spicy Tuna Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in spicy tuna roll, including full nutrition breakdown per roll, macros, and variations for your sushi tracking.
h1: Calories in a Spicy Tuna Roll
assumptions: Standard 6-8 piece roll with raw tuna, spicy mayo, sushi rice, nori, and minimal veggies; no sides or dipping sauce.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, rice type, and mayo amount. Check menus or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical spicy tuna roll has about 290 kcal, with 13 g protein and 11 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use brown rice instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard 6-8 piece roll.

faqs.q: What's the protein in spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: About 13 g protein, mainly from the tuna.

faqs.q: Are spicy tuna rolls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 600 mg per roll due to rice seasoning and soy elements.

faqs.q: How does spicy mayo affect calories in spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: It adds about 50 kcal; skipping it reduces totals to ~240 kcal.
No, with 38 g carbs from rice; opt for modifications like no rice.
